About Me

My name is Abdelakder Mejdoubi. I am a Developer, Teacher and a Computer Science Engineer.

SUMMARY

Passionate computer science engineer with 4 years of experience in programming and IT solutions Developing. Teacher of Mathematics, Algorithms and Data Structure Programming with 2 years of Experience. As well as I am a Doctoral candidate in Artificial Intelligence and its Application.

EXPERIENCE AS DEVELOPER AND PROGRAMMER

Machine Learning

Machine Learning Models Developer

Machine Learning Models Development for different problem such as Computer Vision and Text Mining, using various Algorithms and Deep neural nets.

Developer and Programmer

IT solution Development and Programming

The design and the development of IT solutions for different kind of problems.

Tutor

Online Tutoring

I am a Udemy tutor, i have a Python Machine Learning Course, as well as i aim to lunch my Youtube channel to help people to learn Algorithms and Programming.

WORKING EXPERIENCE

Teacher

Teacher of Mathematics

I am currently teaching Mathematics at High school and i am doing that since Nov.2020.

Teacher

Teacher of Algorithms and Data Structures

I did Teach Algorithms and Data Structures at Saida University, Algeria from Sept.2019 until July.2020 as well the practical Programming using C and Java languages.
